Arranged marriage: Woman raped, bullied, and beaten by husband after she moved to New Zealand https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/arranged-marriage-woman-raped-bullied-and-beaten-by-husband-after-she-moved-to-new-zealand/QV2H6FKUQJDWHFJXTSAKGBSNWM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/arranged-marriage-woman-raped-bullied-and-beaten-by-husband-after-she-moved-to-new-zealand/QV2H6FKUQJDWHFJXTSAKGBSNWM/ Hannah BartlettThe man unsuccessfully appealed his conviction for raping his wife. Fri, 09 Aug 2024 08:00:00 +0000 The man tried to appeal his convictions after being jailed for seven years and 10 months.
Police find body of missing 77-year-old woman at Hamilton Gardens https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/police-find-body-of-missing-77-year-old-woman-at-hamilton-gardens/RS4D4NXL4VDTVDPHGEBO7EZNL4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/police-find-body-of-missing-77-year-old-woman-at-hamilton-gardens/RS4D4NXL4VDTVDPHGEBO7EZNL4/ Jessica Littler's Honda Jazz was found at the gate of the city's gardens. Fri, 09 Aug 2024 07:17:28 +0000 Police have found the body of missing 77-year-old Hamilton woman Jessica Littler.
Energy crisis: How to save money as residential users face power price spike https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/energy-crisis-how-to-save-money-as-residential-users-face-power-price-spike/5JF36ECNV5HOTGFSLMAYABJIJM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/energy-crisis-how-to-save-money-as-residential-users-face-power-price-spike/5JF36ECNV5HOTGFSLMAYABJIJM/ Raphael FranksWholesale electricity prices double in three weeks; residential users face bigger bills. Fri, 09 Aug 2024 07:00:00 +0000 Wholesale power prices have doubled in the past three weeks. This has been blamed on low levels of New Zealand’s hydro lakes. Consumer NZ told the Herald retail power companies, and residential consumers, were shielded from current wholesale prices, but they would eventually flow down.
Philip Polkinghorne murder trial: Friends of Pauline Hanna reveal concerns about marriage https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/philip-polkinghorne-murder-Trial-friends-of-pauline-hanna-reveal-concerns-about-marriage/4VQTLMXYVVAILATLCUVMAABZ3M/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/philip-polkinghorne-murder-Trial-friends-of-pauline-hanna-reveal-concerns-about-marriage/4VQTLMXYVVAILATLCUVMAABZ3M/ Craig KapitanThe eye surgeon is accused of having strangled his wife then staging a suicide. Taupō District Council finds asbestos in Broadlands Rd landfillhttps://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/taupo-district-council-finds-asbestos-in-broadlands-rd-landfill/BA6PFBUVC5HIDPH64V5P2FKVKA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/taupo-district-council-finds-asbestos-in-broadlands-rd-landfill/BA6PFBUVC5HIDPH64V5P2FKVKA/ Maryana GarciaConcrete recycling at the site has been put on hold. The landfill remains open. Fri, 09 Aug 2024 06:07:16 +0000 Taupō District Council is testing its stockpiled waste concrete after asbestos was discovered in dumped concrete at Broadlands Rd Landfill.

The questions Year 8 maths pupils are expected to answer correctly https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/the-questions-year-8-maths-pupils-are-expected-to-answer- Correctly/WZSTNMU76VFMTJNXPTU4XTTGMI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/the-questions-year-8-maths-pupils-are-expected-to-answer- Correctly/WZSTNMU76VFMTJNXPTU4XTTGMI/ Christopher Luxon claims four out of five Year 8 students were behind in their learning. Fri, 09 Aug 2024 05:37:40 +0000 New Zealand school children must be able to read, write and compare fractions, add and subtract decimals, solve linear equations, and find the perimeter and areas of shapes by the time they reach Year 8. Photo / 123RF
